Title: INEC promises transparent Anambra and FCT elections
Summary: INEC promises transparent Anambra and FCT area council polls . The assurance was given by the chairman of the commission, Prof. Mahmood .

Title: APC says Tinubu’s reforms mocked by critics are yielding results
Summary: Lagos State Chapter of the All Progressives Congress (APC) commends 411 per cent revenue increase . APC says Tinubu’s reforms mocked by critics are yielding results .

Title: China contributes 30% to global economy — Envoy
Summary: Chinese government lauds Nigerian government's decision to include Chinese language in its curriculum for senior secondary schools . Chinese government calls it an important bridge for deepening China-Nigeria friendship . China contributes 30% to global economy .

Title: Ogun NSCDC arrests over 50 vandals of critical national assets in 11 months
Summary: Commandant of the Ogun State Command of the Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps, Remilekun Ekundayo, said yesterday that the command had arrested over 50 vandals of Critical National Assets and Infrastructure (CNAI) between October 2024 and September 2025 .

Title: Voters Registration: Kaduna gov urges LG chairs, others to mobilise residents
Summary: Concerned about low voter registration turnout in the state, Kaduna State Governor, Uba Sani, has urged local government chairmen, traditional institutions, religious leaders, and the media to intensify mobilisation efforts to ensure maximum registration .

Title: Tragedy as middle-aged man stabs grandparents to death over food
Summary: A 30-year-old man, identified as Mutawakilu Ibrahim, stabbed his grandparents, Muhammad Dansokoto and Hadiza Tasidi, to death following an altercation over a food-related disagreement .

Title: Eminent Nigerians, academics seek education reforms to tackle national challenges
Summary: Eminent Nigerians, academics, and policymakers have called for urgent reforms in the nation’s education sector to make it more functional, proactive, and capable of addressing present challenges while preparing for the future .

Title: Afenifere to Senate, AGF: Establish if Natasha lied against Akpabio
Summary: The pan-Yoruba socio-political organisation, Afenifere, has called on the Senate and the office of the Attorney-General of the Federation to establish if Natasha Akpoti-Uduaghan’s claims against the Senate president, Senator God's will Akpabio is true or not . The group

Title: Tragedy as 30-year-old man stabs grandparents to death over food dispute
Summary: Mutawakilu Ibrahim allegedly stabbed his grandparents, Muhammad Dansokoto (75) and Hadiza Tasidi (65) to death . The 30-year-old allegedly stabbed the grandparents to death following an altercation over a food-related disagreement .

Title: Plateau miners trained on sustainable mining, global best practice
Summary: Plateau miners in Plateau have received training on best practices that enhance their trade . To improve the livelihoods of miners, support the government's efforts to raise revenue, and ensure sustainable national development .
